image-uploader/load-error: There was an error reading the file.
image-uploader/error: Sorry, your image could not be uploaded. $error$ here is $name$. [img]$url$[/img]
image-uploader/trash: We could not move the project to the trash folder. You should delete the project manually.
image-uploader/create-error: There was an error creating the project.
image-uploader/title-error: There was an error setting the project title.
image-uploader/size: Perhaps try uploading a smaller image.
